The probability that an event will occur is the fraction of times you expect to see that event over the course of many trials @motulskyIntuitiveBiostatisticsNonmathematical2018.

A probability is a fraction and always ranges from zero to one. 
$$
\textrm{Probability} = \frac{\textrm{Odds}}{(1+\textrm{Odds})}
$$
